description.title: Visibility Config: get logs, public event, one event is public
description.purpose: Uses a simple guessing game, with VisibilityConfig.eventLogConfigs[0].isPublic set to true. This is set for one event within the contract, the Guessed event, such that anyone is able to see it. Two gateway connections are used, the first by a dev user that deploys the contract and the second by a player of the game. The dev user waits for the player to play some moves, then runs a script to getPastEvents on the contract to see what the user was playing. Normally without setting isPublic to true, the dev user would not be able to see the event.
